com.bsuuv.grocerymanager.data

Class GroceryListExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bsuuv.grocerymanager.data.GroceryListExtractor

  • public class GroceryListExtractor
extends Object
    Business logic class that coordinates when food-items are ready to appear in the grocery list.

    Food-items are ready to appear in the grocery list, when their countdown value is > 1.0 and they haven't been removed from the grocery list by the user. Food-item's countdown value starts at its frequency quotient (see FrequencyQuotientCalculator for more details on frequency quotients) and is incremented by the value of its frequency quotient whenever its eligibility to be on the grocery list is evaluated. When a food-item is added on the grocery list, its countdown value is reset to its frequency quotient.

    See Also:
    FrequencyQuotientCalculator

    • Method Detail

      • extractGroceryListFromFoodItems

        public List<FoodItemEntity> extractGroceryListFromFoodItems(List<FoodItemEntity> foodItems)
        Iterates through the given list of food-items and checks which of them are ready to appear on the grocery list.
        Parameters:
        foodItems - List of food-items from which the grocery list should be formed. In practice, in this app this always corresponds to all food-items.
        Returns:
        Food items, that are eligible to appear on the grocery list (countdown value >1.0 and not previously removed from grocery list). For information on the countdown value see FrequencyQuotientCalculator.
